TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content: When were those made? Is anybody from that time still on the team?
[@ZooNamedGames](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/103726-zoonamedgames/) made the ![:/](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon1.png ":/") emote.

> 
> 
> On 6/15/2020 at 12:07 AM, Deddly said:
> 
> 
> Huh. I always felt those emojis didn't look quite right, but I never stopped to think about why. Now I know!
> 

same

> 
> 
> On 6/15/2020 at 1:50 AM, Dman979 said:
> 
> 
> [@ZooNamedGames](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/103726-zoonamedgames/) made the ![:/](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon1.png ":/") emote.
> 

I just made it to match the rest of the emotes.
I missed this when it happened, but I think it was a moderator experiment of some sort, so can you guys fill me in on what the deal was with Green Iron Crown?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, RyanRising said:
> 
> 
> I missed this when it happened, but I think it was a moderator experiment of some sort, so can you guys fill me in on what the deal was with Green Iron Crown?
> 

I think this post explains it best:

[https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/97065-destroy-green-iron-crown/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/97065-destroy-green-iron-crown/)

> 
> 
> On 6/19/2020 at 8:27 PM, ZooNamedGames said:
> 
> 
> I just made it to match the rest of the emotes.
> 

It looks good, but now I can't forget they're all wrong. ![:/](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon1.png ":/")

> 
> 
> 6 hours ago, Dman979 said:
> 
> 
> It looks good, but now I can't forget they're all wrong. ![:/](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon1.png ":/")
> 

The red hair on them is what happens when they are exposed to large quantities of humans. And the forum is full of human users. Problem solved. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ":wink:")

> 
> 
> On 6/20/2020 at 8:01 AM, Deddly said:
> 
> 
> I think this post explains it best:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/97065-destroy-green-iron-crown/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/97065-destroy-green-iron-crown/)
> 

Except for the part where they say I created the Green Iron Crown account. The last post in that thread is a more accurate account even if the poster is a bit of a jerk.

I liked [@Green Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/140626-green-iron-crown/). I kept upping the rep in that fun forum event, [@Red Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12858-red-iron-crown/). ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, adsii1970 said:
> 
> 
> I liked [@Green Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/140626-green-iron-crown/). I kept upping the rep in that fun forum event, [@Red Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12858-red-iron-crown/). ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")
> 

As I recall [@vexx32](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12283-vexx32/) was the true ringleader of that particular bit of silliness. I miss that guy, hands down the best riddle writer on the forum.

> 
> 
> 10 hours ago, Red Iron Crown said:
> 
> 
> As I recall [@vexx32](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12283-vexx32/) was the true ringleader of that particular bit of silliness. I miss that guy, hands down the best riddle writer on the forum.
> 

I miss [@Red Iron Crown](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/12858-red-iron-crown/). The absolute master in cheesy jokes ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
Is having an alt account on the forum allowed?

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, The Dressian Exploder said:
> 
> 
> Is having an alt account on the forum allowed?
> 

Ooh! Ooh! I know this one!

![RageFaceNo-5ae79bcd3128340037321cb4.jpg](https://www.liveabout.com/thmb/GqRGvP3VhdxanwGVp54MQ-XHcR4=/3198x1799/smart/filters:no_upscale()/RageFaceNo-5ae79bcd3128340037321cb4.jpg)

(actual look Vanamonde will give you)

> 
> 
> 10 minutes ago, The Dressian Exploder said:
> 
> 
> Is having an alt account on the forum allowed?
> 

It is not. There's too much potential for people causing trouble and then trying to deny responsibility and whatnot.
Is there a subforum for announcing a Twitch stream?

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, septemberWaves said:
> 
> 
> Is there a subforum for announcing a Twitch stream?
> 

Kerbal Network is where such announcements are usually made, but if you had a mission thread I feel that would also be appropriate..

> 
> 
> 9 minutes ago, James Kerman said:
> 
> 
> Kerbal Network is where such announcements are usually made, but if you had a mission thread I feel that would also be appropriate..
> 

So just the subforum in general rather than any particular thread?  

I do not have a mission thread. I do have a thread for the modpack I am putting together; what I am considering streaming is some of the playtesting I am doing for that modpack, so presumably that counts.

> 
> 
> Just now, septemberWaves said:
> 
> 
> I do have a thread for the modpack I am putting together; what I am considering streaming is some of the playtesting I am doing for that modpack, so presumably that counts.
> 

That sounds like a great place!

> 
> 
> 3 minutes ago, James Kerman said:
> 
> 
> That sounds like a great place!
> 

Good to know. Thanks for the quick answers.

Nothing is jumping to mind, [@problemecium](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/101649-problemecium/). Go ahead and post yours. We can always merge it later if an older one turns up.

I just noticed there's a "Theme" dropdown at the bottom of the forum page, but there's not much in it. Any chance this could be leveraged to deliver a dark theme?

![d0dxvqd.png](https://i.imgur.com/d0dxvqd.png)
Inquiries have been made.

1. How long have you moderators been around?

and 

2. Can you pin the Megathread thread
